page.title: 02Recreation_Our Playing field
page.content: There is a very small playing field in Broadwindsor.Lots of Broadwindsor children go there after school.There are two swings,a bench and an old see_saw.Some of the children who have to go past the playing field on the way from school stop to have a swing. { {Our Choir In Broadwindsor choir there are about 20 people in all.Four of us are children,and the rest are grown_ups. Miss.Shiner is the choir leader,and Mrs.Frampton is the organist.We meet every other Friday in the church.If we sing at a wedding we are paid 60 pence!
